title: Advent of Cyber 2023
description: This is the official Certificate of Completion and Badge for TryHackMe's annual 24 Days of Advent of Cyber 2023. I have been acknowledged for completing all 24 challenges in 24 days.

title: Web Fundamentals

title: Jr Penetration Tester
